title: Pages | Instructure Developer Documentation Portal
curl_examples:
curl -X POST -H 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \

https://<canvas>/api/v1/courses/123/pages \

-d wiki_page[title]=New+page

-d wiki_page[body]=New+body+text
all_code_blocks:
curl -X POST -H 'Authorization: Bearer <token>' \

https://<canvas>/api/v1/courses/123/pages \

-d wiki_page[title]=New+page

-d wiki_page[body]=New+body+text
